name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Columbus OSU

reviews.title: Great OSU hotel
reviews.text: Stayed 1 nite for OSU game--Appreciated early check-in, gave us toothpaste as it can't be taken on the plane. The room also had 2 tvs, microwave, and fridge in it. A very complete continental breakfast was provided. The facility was very clean.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed in the Columbus area on a number of occasions. Fairfield Inn did an excellent job of making the stay a pleasant experience. The staff was nice, (when we asked for directions they printed out a map quest for us) room was clean and comfortable. Nice continental breakfast in the morning. We found the experience to be a pleasant surprise and a good value. I cannot say that about all our past choices (for stays) in the Columbus area. Great job Fairfield Inn we will be back.
reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reviews said it was convenient to the OSU campus, but thats an understatement. This was our first time in Columbus and I checked the reviews on Tripadvisor and that's how we made our decision. Our daughter and son-in-law are in med school at OSU (new students) and they just said try to get close to the campus. What a great location. The hotel staff treated us great for the time we walked in the door until we checked out (3 night stay). The hotel is clean both inside and out. Rooms are a bit small but thats Fairfield. No question where we will stay when we return for another visit. Rates a little pricey but we were on a football game weekend. Go Buckeye's!! P.S. Thanks tripadvisor members for your reviews of this property.
reviews.title: clean, comfortable and convenient!!!!

reviews.text: After staying at the Auburn, Mass. Fairfield we booked this Fairfield Inn & Suites on our "tour the colleges" summer! Once again an excellent hotel. I tend to be very picky, I mean, VERY picky and this was a great stay. I made our reservation through the Marriott website and used my Marriott points for a "free" night stay.
reviews.title: Another Great Fairfield!

likes.liked: — It felt like it was new and it was immaculate!

reviews.text: We checked in and I really did expect some type of slip up on the free stay, but to my surprise it was a pleasant experiece to check in without any problems. The exterior of the hotel was beautiful and parking was very close to the building. The lobby was clean along with the hallways and the room was immaculate. The beds were extremely comfortable with plenty of great pillows. The air conditioning worked great and the bathroom was a good size with everything in top shape.
reviews.title: Cute and Clean

reviews.text: The breakfast that comes with your stay was better than most. They had two waffle makers to make your own, breakfast sandwiches, bagels, muffins and much much more. The eating area was very clean and there was plenty of everything even at 8:30.
reviews.title: Great little hotel

reviews.text: There is a Damon's restaurant right there in their parking lot if you like Damon's for lunch or dinner.
reviews.title: First time In Columbus!

reviews.text: Was great atmosphere for Buckeye game. Fight songs in lobby were a wonderful touch. Great breakfast. We had an emergency at home and were not able to stay as we had hoped, right after checking in. In fact, we got the call as we were still in the lobby heading to our room. The manager on duty, (I think his name was Cary or Casey) was so extremely helpful and friendly and made a terrible situation much better. We wll defintely be back, and we want to thank the front desk who were very very helpful in our time of need.
reviews.title: great customer service

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for one night as we were visiting OSU with our daughter. The hotel is a few minutes drive down the road from OSU. The location is quiet and comfortable. If my daugher decides to attend OSU, this is the hotel I would stay in when in Columbus.
reviews.title: Nice Stay

reviews.text: The staff were quite friendly and professional.
reviews.title: Close to OSU, Price Was Right

reviews.text: From the lobby to my room, everything was fresh and clean.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay!!!!!!!

likes.liked: — It was clean and a great location.

reviews.text: I found the exercise room to be lacking for a property of its size.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

aka: Fairfield Inn & Suites Columbus Osu Hotel
